comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Prince Oskar of Prussia (Oskar Karl Gustav Adolf) (27 July 1888 in Potsdam, Germany – 27 January 1958 in Munich, Germany) was the fifth son of German Emperor Wilhelm II and Duchess Augusta Viktoria of Schleswig-Holstein, the German Empress. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Oskar_of_Prussia

comment._content: trialsanderrors and Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for bringing our attention to the full names here.  We'll include this info. in the description next time we update.
